Articles.Content:
The objective of this game is to share a highlight of your day, and the person underneath can Write a comment under it (If you can't think of a comment, just leave it blank)

So, today I saw a great TF2 Music video http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PctwaJKjlAk

Sounds good. Seems like it could be an actual TV show.

I played Mafia II and got a bunch of Tommy ammo.

Nice, never played it, It's on steam right?

I google Images'd 'Spitfire' and only found 2 poneh pictures, strange....
Well I'm off of school so I slept until nine, attempted to do homework, but didn't, watched another episode of Breaking Bad, and worked on my ksp/mlp crossover fanfic.

Oooh, I can has link? Pretty pwease

Another thing I did today was homework, EEBUL HOMEWORK

One page on Anarchy for modern studies
I like where this thread is going. PONIFY!

I guess the direction of this thread is your daily highlight...

I wish- DAMMIT WRONG GAME. DEER PRNSRS CLSTEER TODY I FUND OOT HUW TU SPEEK DERPE AND SCOOTESH AT THU SAEM TIEM.

Yes, you can (http://www.fimfiction.net/story/141086/close-encounters-of-the-kerbal-kind) It's rather short and I only just uploaded the prolouge, also password is kerbals

Must also post something on topic: Ummm, Today I am hanging out with my best friend, and we are going to go the Haunted Mines haunted hosue.

So, did you get scared?

So earlier I had a dream where I was a pilot in the Battle of Britain and me and my wingman managed to get rid of a squadron of Bombers, with him baiting a 109, flying towards a bomber, and I got behind the 109 and shot it's engine, my wingman pulled out, but the 109 crashed into the Junker, creating an explosion knocking out the nearby Bombers

Sounds similar to mine about me being a prisoner in a German POW camp.

I ate some toast.

Yum, I am your sandwich *enters yuri's mouth*

I discovered one of my new favourite songs (UMAD CAUSE I USE BRITISH SPELLING HUHUHUHU)
Just found some good music by WoodenToaster

Good Ol' woodentoaster

I tried playing war thunder, and failed horribly

War Thunder, sound good.

The song I found is not technicly from WoodenToaster, it's from The Living Tombstone and WoodenToaster, but it's still pretty good (Idk if it's because it's actualy good or because of the pony message, but I liked it.) The song?

. Edited October 26, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse
One word: Waffles, delicious waffles.
Lucky man, waffles are delicious (do you have maple syrup with that?)

(After you said it's by TheLivingTombstone AND WoodenToaster, I knew what it was That one's been stuck In my head forever, not as much as

though)

Mmmmm, Waffles....

So I decided I want to Learn swedish. Oh, and I'm better at war thunder now

So I make you remember a song, Im glad to have helped you.

P.S. WoodenToaster and TLT make good things when the work together, no?

P.P.S. im not realy into rock, (ace in exile is rock, no?) I like elctro-thigny more that rock but it's good (I guess?)

(It's Metal you silly half-brony)

I had dinner, now I need to continue with homework

and PS. The best parts of Aces in Exile are 2:20 to 3:38 and 3:42 onward

Edited October 26, 2013 by Annoyingorbits

So, anybody has done something today?

Just found something that is... look by yourself :

...and Cupcakes and rainbows are always good...

Rainbow-flavored cupcake, delicious...

Edited October 27, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse
Yeah, I accidentally got locked outside with the dog.
I used the power of necromancy to bring this thread back to life.
I had school, 'Nuff said.

Listening to Daft Punk...

Harder

Better

Faster

Stronger
